name: CL_QANSWER_FAMILY_PROBS
description: This table stores information about the medical problems the patient's family members have that the patient entered when filling out their family history.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FAM_MEDICAL_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: The family medical history category ID for the associated family member.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_PROBLEM_ASSOC_MEM
columns.description: If the patient lists a family history problem, this is the unique identifier for the associated family member.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_PROBLEM_PAT_HX_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient response category ID for the family member problem.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_PROBLEM_COMMENT
columns.description: Additional information the patient provided about the problem associated with their family member when they were filling out their family history.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_PROBLEM_AGE_OF_ONSET
columns.description: Approximate age that the problem was identified in the associated family member that was provided by the patient when they were filling out their family history.
